net.neto_framework.server

Class ClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.neto_framework.server.ClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ClientConnection
extends Object
implements Runnable
    A thread to handle all client connections individually.
    Author:
    BleedObsidian (Jesse Prescott)

      • addUdpConnection

        public void addUdpConnection(Connection udpConnection)
        Add the UDP connection of client. This can be used when a handshake packet is received telling the server what port to communicate to the client with.
        Parameters:
        udpConnection - UDP Connection.
